document.full_text: indian prime minister manmohan singh will travel to afghanistan for two days on thursday to discuss security and development, the prime minister's office said wednesday, amid regional uncertainty following the death of osama bin laden.
document.title: india pm to visit afghanistan amid regional uncertainty
lines_and_colors: indian prime minister manmohan singh will travel to afghanistan for two days on thursday to discuss security and development, the prime minister's office said wednesday, amid regional uncertainty following the death of osama bin laden.
